title: News19
lyrics:
Paroles de la chanson News 19 par Deezy McDuffie
Cut the news on, he ain't got no shoes on
Cut the news on, he ain't got no shoes on
My lil niggas been out sliding all night
My lil niggas been out sliding all night
Tell a thot ho to get it off the floor
Tell a thot ho to get it off the floor
You got bags lil nigga? we got more
You got bags lil nigga? we got more

Wipe a nigga nose, clean him on that slime shit
And we ain't tellin' 12, we do the time bitch
Niggas cappin' on the 'Gram, stay with that lyin' shit
They said that I ain't got them bands, they on some blind shit
Young nigga ride around K'd up

Go against the gang, get sprayed up
Young nigga ball like the Pacers
Hundred round clip for the haters
Better cuff your lil ho 'fore I take her
I be drippin', I be havin' all the paper
Never slippin', I be slidin' with the draco
I'm a hot boy just like Bankroll
I heard you got them bags but you a pussy nigga
Bitch I'm a stepper, you ain't even got to push me nigga
I heard you got them bags but you a pussy nigga
Bitch I'm a stepper, you ain't even got to push me nigga

Cut the news on, he ain't got no shoes on
Cut the news on, he ain't got no shoes on
My lil niggas been out sliding all night
My lil niggas been out sliding all night

Tell a thot ho to get it off the floor
Tell a thot ho to get it off the floor
You got bags lil nigga? we got more
You got bags lil nigga? we got more

Make her mix it, tell her get it off the floor bitch
I heard them niggas gettin' money but we more rich
All that flexin', all that cappin' get your door kicked
All that pillow talkin' hating get your ho hit
I'm with slime, you see them snakes up on my collar
Might put a nigga on the news about a dollar
These niggas snitching, if I shoot 'em they gon' holler
My teacher used to tell me I'm gon' be a problem

I know a lot of niggas mad because I'm up
Put an address on that diss and they get bust
Fuck a vest, I'm aiming at his neck and up
I press that button, by the night I bet he touched, mob

Cut the news on, he ain't got no shoes on
Cut the news on, he ain't got no shoes on
My lil niggas been out sliding all night
My lil niggas been out sliding all night
Tell a thot ho to get it off the floor
Tell a thot ho to get it off the floor
You got bags lil nigga? we got more
You got bags lil nigga? we got more
